Action.author: achenette
Action.body: Note: The 5 story points are because the doc impact of the outstanding work isn't clear. If submitted changes are clear and timely (and there aren't a ton of them), the points can probably go down.

Action.author: achenette
Action.body: *Shawn*: Should I remove the PoET section from the Introduction? From Shawn: Yes, move it to the Architecture Guide; add a cross reference where PoET is mentioned in the Consensus section. (Oct 18 2017) >

Action.author: achenette
Action.body: *Adam*: The Seth CLI overview needs a link to the Etherium Contract ABI. N/A for this task. Adam has rewritten/reorganized the Seth content; it's now in one chapter ("Seth xxx"). I'll handle this link issue as part of that effort. >

Action.author: achenette
Action.body: *Cian*: Please review the Journal section (in the Architecture chapter) and supply corrections as necessary. Created a separate task for Cian's review of the Journal section - see STL-799. >

Action.author: achenette
Action.body: *Shawn*: Should I remove the Examples chapter? Created a separate task to work with Shawn on moving the SupplyChain and Private UTXO examples out of the Examples chapter - see STL-800. >
